reuze.pending

Class MapAgentView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • reuze.pending.AgentAppEnvironmentView
            • reuze.pending.EmptyEnvironmentView
              • reuze.pending.MapAgentView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, aa_i_EnvironmentView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedMapAgentView

    public class MapAgentView
extends EmptyEnvironmentView
    General graphical environment view implementation for map agent applications. This view requires the used environment to be of type aa_EnvironmentMap. All agents are tracked but only the track of the first agent is shown.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
